channel.title: [FIXED](Release)Bandos Cape Model(Release)[FIXED]
channel.description:
Hello. I got fixed the Bandos cape model, now it does not go to weapon place. It goes now to cape place! Download link:[url=http://uppit.com/v/04IVIY7T]http://uppit.com/v/04IVIY7T[/url]
Pictures: Sided:[IMG]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/Bandoscapesided.jpg[/img]
Inventory:[IMG]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/Bandoscapeinv.jpg[/img]
Look:[IMG]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/Bandoscapelook.jpg[/img]
Now open your client files and class8.java. Now add this code to it [code]if(i == 12345) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12122; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12121; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12121; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Bandos Cape"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "The Legendary God Cape".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
Now save and compile. Now run your client, log in and say [code]add model 12121 add model 12122[/code]
Now getting it to position rightly. Now open your server's folder and Find item.java then search for:[code]Cape[/code] Now you should see lot of item ids put the Bandos cape's item id here and save it then compile.
Congralutions!
Please post replys. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Don't steal other's work.[/center]

item.title: [FIXED](Release)Bandos Cape Model(Release)[FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

Hello. I got fixed the Bandos cape model, now it does not go to weapon place. It goes now to cape place!
Download link:http://uppit.com/v/04IVIY7T

Pictures:
Sided:

Inventory:

Look:

Now open your client files and class8.java.
Now add this code to it

if(i == 12345) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12122; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12121; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12121; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Bandos Cape"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "The Legendary God Cape".getBytes(); // Item Examine }

Now save and compile.
Now run your client, log in and say add model 12121 add model 12122

Now getting it to position rightly. Now open your server’s folder and Find item.java then search for:Cape
Now you should see lot of item ids put the Bandos cape’s item id here and save it then compile.

Congralutions!

Please post replys.
[center] Don’t steal other’s work.[/center]
